zero_of_map_zero:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⥤ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
theorem zero_of_map_zero (F : «expr ⥤ » C D) [preserves_zero_morphisms F] [Faithful F] {X Y : C} (f : «expr ⟶ » X Y)
    (h : F.map f = 0) : f = 0 :=
  F.map_injective <| h.trans <| eq.symm <| F.map_zero _ _
#align zero_of_map_zero zero_of_map_zero
preserves_zero_morphisms_of_map_zero_obj:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≅ » -/
theorem preserves_zero_morphisms_of_map_zero_object (i : «expr ≅ » (F.obj 0) 0) : preserves_zero_morphisms F :=
  {
    map_zero' := fun X Y =>
      calc
        F.map (0 : «expr ⟶ » X Y) = «expr ≫ » (F.map (0 : «expr ⟶ » X 0)) (F.map 0) := by
          rw [← functor.map_comp, comp_zero]
        _ = «expr ≫ » (F.map 0) («expr ≫ » («expr ≫ » i.hom i.inv) (F.map 0)) := by
          rw [iso.hom_inv_id, category.id_comp]
        _ = 0 := by simp only [zero_of_to_zero i.hom, zero_comp, comp_zero]
         }
#align preserves_zero_morphisms_of_map_zero_object preserves_zero_morphisms_of_map_zero_object
map_zero:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⥤ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
#print map_zero /-
/-
Copyright (c) 2022 Markus Himmel. All rights reserved.
Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Markus Himmel
-/
@[simp]
protected theorem map_zero (F : «expr ⥤ » C D) [preserves_zero_morphisms F] (X Y : C) : F.map (0 : «expr ⟶ » X Y) = 0 :=
  preserves_zero_morphisms.map_zero' _ _
#align map_zero map_zero
-/
map_eq_zero_iff:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⥤ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
#print map_eq_zero_iff /-
theorem map_eq_zero_iff (F : «expr ⥤ » C D) [preserves_zero_morphisms F] [Faithful F] {X Y : C} {f : «expr ⟶ » X Y} :
    F.map f = 0 ↔ f = 0 :=
  ⟨F.zero_of_map_zero _, by
    rintro rfl
    exact F.map_zero _ _⟩
#align map_eq_zero_iff map_eq_zero_iff
-/
